attributes.action: Support Major Yuri Luzhkov and the City of Moscow"s ban of  Marches
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Mayor Luzhkov and the city of Moscow have been correct in banning the Gay Pride March on the 27th May 2007, by the Russian Courts of Law.
The city of Moscow banned the march to protect its citizens, the disgraceful scenes of homosexuals attacking the police authorities proved they had to uphold law and order.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
